Text.Name: Building_Geothermy
Text.Desc: A chasm cracking all the way down to the earth’s core. Scorching wind keeps blowing out.

Text.Name: Building_ColdHole
Text.ThingName: เตาพลังเย็น
Text.Desc: An ancient sage tried to concoct a fate-reversing elixir here, yet their creation is devastated by a heavenly tribulation. The furnace’s blaze was reversed into ice that doesn’t melt, even after hundreds of centuries.

Text.Name: Building_OuterWorld
Text.ThingName: รอยแยกสู่โลกอื่น
Text.Desc: Space here has been shattered due to a battle between powerful sages, and has transformed into a stable Otherworld Rift over the years, allowing items or cultivator from other planes passing it from time to time.

Text.Name: Building_YinYang
Text.ThingName: แผ่นศิลาหยินหยาง
Text.Desc: A strange stone created during the exchange of Yin and Yang that contains the secret of heaven and earth. The higher the disciple's State is, the profounder the revelation. But meditating on the stone stele will always cause abnormal astronomical phenomena.

Text.Name: Building_DiMu
Text.ThingName: แท่นบูชาแม่ธรณี
Text.Desc: A shrine left by an ancient cult worshipping Earthmother. One can make a wish to the remnant of Earthmother’s will by offering it with หินวิญญาณ, although this may bring natural disasters.

Text.Name: LingShu
Text.ThingName: ต้นไม้เรืองแสง
Text.Desc: A curious plant that can turn soil nearby into ดินวิญญาณ. However, the pollen it releases may cause blocked เส้นลมปราณ and suppressed พลังชี่.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Feel
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Feel the พลังชี่ around Illumitree.
